message_text: Hi, just checking if my pension providers have responded yet?
Thanks Alice, Aviva is still processing your LOA. We expect an update next week.
I've sent these forms twice already. Why is this still not sorted?
I completely understand, Ben. Royal London are delayed, and we're escalating this for you.
Not sure which document you mean by proof of address. Can you clarify?
Any recent utility bill or bank statement with your address will work.
Sorry, been really busy. I'll try to upload the payslip this weekend.
No problem David, thanks for letting us know. A reminder will come through on Monday.
Do I really need to complete the risk questionnaire again?
Yes Emma, regulations require an updated questionnaire, but it should only take 5â€“10 minutes.
